General.Name: Agripower France Sa
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Agripower France Société Anonyme engages in the study, design, installation, and maintenance of biogas plants on behalf of operators. It offers methanization units with a power equivalent of 250 kW to 2 MW to farmers, agro-food manufacturers, or communities. The company is based in Carquefou, France.
General.Address: 9 bis rue de la métallurgie, Carquefou, France, 44470
